title: Quinn the armless
name: quinn
description: A drunken martial arts master, first seen in the taverns of Glimmerdrift [1]. Quinn lost his arms 10 years ago, and learned "Drunken Arts of the legs"
combat: Quinn fights with his legs, through a series of kicking attacks. His signature kicks involve him using his often drunken state to increase randomness of effectiveness, but increase the upper bound of his damage output.
allegiance: Part of the way of the hand
